page.title: 11The Rishton cricket pro.
page.content: Rishton Cricket Club has enough support to afford a South African professional cricketer, called Mike von Vuuren. He comes from Port Elizabeth and has about 35 relatives there. He arrived here three months ago. He came to England to gain experience of the world outside South Africa. He does not think much of the entertainment in Rishton. The only entertainment he likes is going for a drink and he says there is no entertainment for children. He thinks that Rishton Cricket Club is much better than other clubs. He was only six when he started playing cricket. He prefers to bowl rather than bat, but he does enjoy batting as well.
